definition: woods/forest/CL:片[pian4]/circle(s) (i.e. specific group of people)/a collection (of similar things)

sentences.english: And the small mangrove forests left the camp to identify reactive nakamura.
sentences.chinese: 营左押着小林泽前来指认中村功。

sentences.english: Those figures do not include the Hsiao-lin villagers.
sentences.chinese: 这些数据并没有包括小林村的村民。

sentences.english: With Isabella dying, Edgar travels to London to pick up Linton.
sentences.chinese: 伊莎贝拉死后，埃德加去伦敦接回了小林顿。

sentences.english: Takeru Kobayashi is a Japanese professional eater or some people name it as competitive eater .
sentences.chinese: 小林尊是日本专业吃或一些人的名字吃它的竞争力。

sentences.english: Now Lin is helping Jack with the packing.
sentences.chinese: 这会儿小林正帮着杰克收拾行装。

sentences.english: Officials say some 200 people have been flown out of the village of Hsiaolin, in Taiwan's Kaohsiung county.
sentences.chinese: 有官员称，台湾高雄市小林村冲走了约200人。

sentences.english: Herb field mouse (Apodemus uralensis) was removed from plague hosts.
sentences.chinese: 排除了小林姬鼠作为鼠疫宿主的可能。

sentences.english: Xiao Hong is playing with Xiao Lin in the courtyard.
sentences.chinese: 小红和小林一道在院子里玩。

sentences.english: At the end of the competition, Kobayashi had finished five bowls and a total of two kilograms of mutton to take the championship.
sentences.chinese: 比赛结束，小林尊以五碗二公斤的份量勇夺冠军。

sentences.english: I pretend to be a human through Linguini.
sentences.chinese: 而在小林面前，我又得装出一副人的模样。

sentences.english: Xiaolin is a new student, We must look after him.
sentences.chinese: 小林是新来的学生，我们必须照顾他。

sentences.english: Lim and Elaine Teo, 34, both Singaporeans, traveled together.
sentences.chinese: 小林和34岁的新加坡人艾琳，两者一起旅游。

sentences.english: Linton is visibly more ill and hardly has the energy to meet her.
sentences.chinese: 小林顿看上去病情愈发严重，几乎没有去见她的力气。

sentences.english: GOOD! Thank you for your share good music.
sentences.chinese: 小林幸子的歌曲好听，谢谢楼主分享。

sentences.english: Xiao Lin , Please draw up a proposal for this Project .
sentences.chinese: 小林，请给我这个项目草拟一份计划书。

definition: one of the three main divisions of the Book of Songs 詩經|诗经
older male cousin via female line
Dalin or Talin town in Chiayi county 嘉義縣|嘉义县[Jia1 yi4 xian4], west Taiwan
Nana (name)/Nana (1880 novel by Émile Zola)/Nana (Japanese manga series)
